abstract.p: Adatom.com, electronic commerce business, will cut its 55-person work force by 45 percent and reduce spending as part of a restructuring effort aimed at focusing on partnerships in China (S)

block.p: Adatom.com, an electronic commerce business, will cut its 55-person work force by 45 percent and reduce spending as part of a restructuring effort aimed at focusing on partnerships in China. Adatom of Milpitas, Calif., gets most of its revenue from operating an Internet superstore and helping other companies to set up electronic marketplaces. In the new arrangement, announced Monday, the company will license the operation of those businesses to other companies and focus on helping trade between companies in the United States and China. The company reported a net loss of $2.03 million, or 13 cents a share, in the second quarter.
